author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons who were in possession of country made guns in Kolli Hills were arrested by the police here.

Valavandi Nadu police received tip-off that a few had entered the forest area and were involved in hunting. Since the model code of conduct is in force, persons possessing guns were asked to surrender it to the police. The police found three persons with weapon and tried to escape. However, the police caught them. They were Chinnasamy (55), Vijayakumar (29) and Kanagaraj (30) of A. Thannimathipatti in the hilltop.
title: Three arrested
